Curator's comments: Published: M.A. Corzo, Nefertari Luce d'Egitto, Rome 1994, p. 161 [32]. C. Alfano, Nefertari Regina d'Egitto, Le Ciminiere 1999, p.28 [18].

Richmond , VA, Virginia museum of Fine Art. Mummy. The inside story. Mar - Oct 2012. Brisbane, Queensland Museum South Bank.
